title: “The impeachment eagle soars.” (BONUS episode)
description: Jon, Jon, and Crooked Media editor-in-chief Brian Beutler break down the bombshell BuzzFeedNews story that President Trump committed a crime by directing Michael Cohen to lie to Congress about the Trump Tower Moscow deal.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
